chief.note: Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on December 27, 1827, after confirmation.

ended.note: Promoted to Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary

chief.note: Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; nomination later rejected by the Senate.
Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on February 9, 1854, after confirmation.
Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on January 14, 1858, after confirmation.
Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on July 15, 1861, after confirmation.
Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on December 21, 1869, after confirmation.
Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on February 7, 1878, after confirmation.
Commissioned to Brazil and accredited to the Emperor.
Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on August 29, 1893, after confirmation.

ended.note: Promoted to Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary

chief.note: Not commissioned; nomination first rejected and then tabled by the Senate.
Commissioned to the United States of Brazil and accredited to the Chief of the Provisional Government. Declined this appointment.
Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; did not take oath of office for this appointment.
Nomination of May 12, 1992, not acted upon by the Senate.
Nomination of January 6, 1999, withdrawn on May 24, 1999.
